name: Renpy Dating Sim Framework
description:
I took the dating sim engine added the inventory framework. I also gave you the ability to change the gender of your principal character along with showing pictures dependent on your choice. 

Music by Eric Matyas (https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=33721)

The Rose on the title screen is by Konett (Angel Wareman)  (https://konett.itch.io/)

Backgrounds by Feti Sumaryanti (http://fsy.itch.io)

MC Sprite Base by Sutemo (https://sutemo.itch.io/)

Items 'Which needs resizing forewarning' by Caz Wolf (https://cazwolf.itch.io/)
